I downloaded this weeks ago but I didn't want to appear to be a freak fanboy or something posting in all of his torrent chat boxes...Anyway,

For 720p, 

1280x720 + video bit rate 700kbps + mkvGOD = excellent quality

And, if he takes the time to get these 720p rips looking this good, his DVDrips and TVrips will be almost identical as the source video as well.

Also, if you turn off edge and colour enhancement/or a denoise filter in your video player or graphics card these compressed small size videos will look even better if you are "extremely" picky about video quality...this helps with all small size mkvs.

i compared this to the dvd rip and the difference is huge. these look so much better. yet the same file size.
